title: My server is stuck on PBE
body: I tried to sign in and after a rather large update and trying a few times to log in as well as changing my password i noticed that the server was set to PBE and i couldnt change it. I then tried to re download the game to no avail and it cant be changed from PBE server. is anyone else getting this issue?

replies.body:
Hey Buttchin,

This issue can happen when you have the PBE and the NA servers installed to the same location. We have a thread posted [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/YF5Xt191-why-is-the-patcher-showing-pbe-i-clicked-on-the-live-client) that should resolve your issue.

This is happening to me on a few computers. Not sure why. 
Try right clicking and going to 'Run as Administrator' for the quick and dirty fix. 
Haven't tried what Ram linked yet, but it's on my list for the next time it messes up!
